sentences.sentence: It is home to an intricate food web of mosquito larvae, midges and bacteria, many of which can survive only in this unique habitat.
sentences.translation: 它是一个由蚊子幼虫、蠓和细菌组成的复杂食物网的家园，它们当中有许多只能在这个独特的栖息地生存。

sentences.sentence: Outdoors, mosquitoes and midges were a perpetual torment.
sentences.translation: 在户外，蚊子和蠓虫永远让人不得安生。
